00020 #include "Triangle.h"
00021 #include "assert.h"
00022 
00023 namespace brics_3d {
00024 
00025 Triangle::Triangle() {
00026         for (int i = 0; i <= 2; ++i) {
00027                 vertices[i] = Point3D();
00028         }
00029 }
00030 
00031 Triangle::Triangle(Triangle* triangle) {
00032         for (int i = 0; i <= 2; ++i) {
00033                 vertices[i] = Point3D(triangle->getVertex(i));
00034         }
00035 }
00036 
00037 Triangle::Triangle(Point3D vertex1, Point3D vertex2, Point3D vertex3) {
00038         vertices[0] = vertex1;
00039         vertices[1] = vertex2;
00040         vertices[2] = vertex3;
00041 }
00042 
00043 Triangle::~Triangle() {
00044 
00045 }
00046 
00047 Point3D* Triangle::getVertex(int vertexIndex){
00048         assert ((0 <= vertexIndex) && (vertexIndex <= 2)); // check if parameter is in range
00049 
00050         return &(vertices[vertexIndex]);
00051 }
00052 
00053 void Triangle::setVertex(int vertexIndex, Point3D vertex) {
00054         assert ((0 <= vertexIndex) && (vertexIndex <= 2)); // check if parameter is in range
00055 
00056         vertices[vertexIndex] = vertex;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void Triangle::homogeneousTransformation(IHomogeneousMatrix44 *transformation) {
00060         for (int i = 0; i <= 2; ++i) { // propagate transformation to vertices
00061                 vertices[i].homogeneousTransformation(transformation);
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 ostream& operator<<(ostream &outStream, Triangle &triangle) {
00066         outStream << *(triangle.getVertex(0))  << ", ";
00067         outStream << *(triangle.getVertex(1)) << ", ";
00068         outStream << *(triangle.getVertex(2));
00069 
00070         return outStream;
00071 }

00073 }
